EmailTemplate.name: PS CS - Partner NDA
EmailTemplate.subject: Greetings from BlueWave Partner Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName} Thanks for considering partnering with BlueWave! My name is {!User.Name} and I'm with the Partner Support team. We're dedicated to answering any questions you have and assisting however possible. If you ever need to reach us, you can email partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com or call 888.817.2703.
To get the ball rolling, we will be sending over an NDA form via DocuSign shortly. Once you complete it, a member of our Community Solar Business Development team will be in touch to review the terms of the agreement.
Please let us know if you have any questions.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy. - All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.817.2703 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
